definition: World food program (United Nations aid agency)

sentences.english: Shaoxing county is one of the major grain production areas in Zhengjiang province.
sentences.chinese: 紹興縣是浙江省糧食主要產區之一。

sentences.english: Earthworms play a vital role in food production.
sentences.chinese: 在糧食生產方面，蚯蚓扮演極爲重要的作用。

sentences.english: Then said the LORD unto Moses, Behold, I will rain bread from heaven for you;
sentences.chinese: 耶和華對摩西說，我要將糧食從天降給你們。

sentences.english: But the country has every intention of safeguarding its food supply.
sentences.chinese: 但是中國已經在竭力捍衛其糧食供應。

sentences.english: Layer is a method for propagating crops.
sentences.chinese: 壓條是糧食增產的一種方式。

sentences.english: The company monopolized the supply of grain.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司壟斷了糧食的供應。

sentences.english: The feasibility of ergosterol as an index to estimate grain safety degree was discussed in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 探討了麥角甾醇作爲評價糧食質量安全指標的可行性。

sentences.english: Villagers are gathering at the entrance of the village to celebrate this year's grain harvest.
sentences.chinese: 村民們在村頭集會，慶賀今年的糧食豐收。

sentences.english: Old women were rationed to 14 kilograms of grain a month.
sentences.chinese: 對老年婦女每個月配給糧食14公斤。

sentences.english: Wheat is a principle crop in Luliang.
sentences.chinese: 小麥是呂梁市的主要糧食作物之一。

sentences.english: Grain prices have pushed up by 15% year-on-year.
sentences.chinese: 糧食價格比去年同期漲了15%。

sentences.english: And about eighty percent of exports are long-grain rice.
sentences.chinese: 約百分之八十，出口長期糧食大米。

sentences.english: Through 15 years' major harnessment in Kulun county, the grain production has been increased obviously.
sentences.chinese: 庫倫旗經過15年重點治理，糧食產量明顯增加。

sentences.english: Some people have been re-introducing native plants, others have been planting food and flowers.
sentences.chinese: 有人引進了故鄉的植物，還有些人就種了些糧食和花。

sentences.english: China imports a large amount of grains from overseas.
sentences.chinese: 中國從國外進口大量糧食。

sentences.english: North Korea has needed aid to feed its people for more than decade.
sentences.chinese: 十多年來，北韓一直需要糧食援助來讓其國民有飯喫。

definition: Ziyuan county in Guilin 桂林[Gui4 lin2], Guangxi
natural resource (such as water or minerals)/resource (such as manpower or tourism)
